name: Undivided Heart
description: When your Ganyu, who has this card equipped, uses Frostflake Arrow: If this Skill has been used before during this match, the Piercing DMG dealt to all opposing characters on standby is changed to 3.
descriptionraw: When your $[A1101], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S11013]</color>: If this Skill has been used before during this match, the $[K5] dealt to all opposing characters on standby is changed to 3.
descriptionreplaced: When your Ganyu, who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Frostflake Arrow</color>: If this Skill has been used before during this match, the <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> dealt to all opposing characters on standby is changed to 3.
